name: io.github.longmans/coin_api_mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides access to CoinMarketCap's cryptocurrency data. This server enables AI-powered applications to retrieve cryptocurrency listings, quotes, and detailed information about various coins.

tools.name: listing-coins
tools.description: Returns a paginated list of all active cryptocurrencies with latest market data

start.description: Optionally offset the start (1-based index) of the paginated list of items to return.

limit.description: Optionally specify the number of results to return.

price_min.description: Optionally specify a threshold of minimum USD price to filter results by.

price_max.description: Optionally specify a threshold of maximum USD price to filter results by.

market_cap_min.description: Optionally specify a threshold of minimum market cap to filter results by.

market_cap_max.description: Optionally specify a threshold of maximum market cap to filter results by.

volume_24h_min.description: Optionally specify a threshold of minimum 24 hour USD volume to filter results by.

volume_24h_max.description: Optionally specify a threshold of maximum 24 hour USD volume to filter results by.

circulating_supply_min.description: Optionally specify a threshold of minimum circulating supply to filter results by.

circulating_supply_max.description: Optionally specify a threshold of maximum circulating supply to filter results by.

percent_change_24h_min.description: Optionally specify a threshold of minimum 24 hour percent change to filter results by.

percent_change_24h_max.description: Optionally specify a threshold of maximum 24 hour percent change to filter results by.

convert.description: Optionally calculate market quotes in up to 120 currencies at once by passing a comma-separated list of cryptocurrency or fiat currency symbols.

convert_id.description: Optionally calculate market quotes by CoinMarketCap ID instead of symbol.

sort.description: What field to sort the list of cryptocurrencies by.

sort_dir.description: The direction in which to order cryptocurrencies against the specified sort.

cryptocurrency_type.description: The type of cryptocurrency to include.

tag.description: The tag of cryptocurrency to include.

aux.description: Optionally specify a comma-separated list of supplemental data fields to return.

tools.name: get-coin-info
tools.description: Get coins' information includes details like logo, description, official website URL, social links, and links to a cryptocurrency's technical documentation.

id.description: One or more comma-separated CoinMarketCap cryptocurrency IDs. Example: "1,2"

slug.description: Alternatively pass a comma-separated list of cryptocurrency slugs. Example: "bitcoin,ethereum"

symbol.description: Alternatively pass one or more comma-separated cryptocurrency symbols. Example: "BTC,ETH"

address.description: Alternatively pass in a contract address. Example: "0xc40af1e4fecfa05ce6bab79dcd8b373d2e436c4e"

skip_invalid.description: Pass true to relax request validation rules. When requesting records on multiple cryptocurrencies an error is returned if any invalid cryptocurrencies are requested or a cryptocurrency does not have matching records in the requested timeframe. If set to true, invalid lookups will be skipped allowing valid cryptocurrencies to still be returned.

aux.description: Optionally specify a comma-separated list of supplemental data fields to return. Pass urls,logo,description,tags,platform,date_added,notice,status to include all auxiliary fields.

tools.name: get-coin-quotes
tools.description: the latest market quote for 1 or more cryptocurrencies. Use the "convert" option to return market values in multiple fiat and cryptocurrency conversions in the same call.

id.description: One or more comma-separated cryptocurrency CoinMarketCap IDs. Example: 1,2

slug.description: Alternatively pass a comma-separated list of cryptocurrency slugs. Example: "bitcoin,ethereum"

symbol.description: Alternatively pass one or more comma-separated cryptocurrency symbols. Example: "BTC,ETH"

convert.description: Optionally calculate market quotes in up to 120 currencies at once by passing a comma-separated list of cryptocurrency or fiat currency symbols.

convert_id.description: Optionally calculate market quotes by CoinMarketCap ID instead of symbol. This option is identical to convert outside of ID format.

aux.description: "num_market_pairs,cmc_rank,date_added,tags,platform,max_supply,circulating_supply,total_supply,is_active,is_fiat"Optionally specify a comma-separated list of supplemental data fields to return.

skip_invalid.description: Pass true to relax request validation rules.
